name: Pekoe
storyline: As the newest resident and teahouse owner in town, you’ll learn everything there is to harvesting, preparing, and serving tea. Unique rituals and tea-making styles to make an endless combination of recipes. Meet and build relationships with 16 unique characters in town, and visit the many teahouses to purchase exclusive teaware and ingredients.
summary: Blend tea and friendship in the flavorful world of Pekoe, a cozy cat-filled tea-making simulator about taking the time for self-care and connecting with what makes you happy. Build relationships, upgrade your teahouse, and discover new recipes as you work towards creating a place you can call home.
